failure_mode: Emission level exceeds acceptable limits
failure_effect: Interference affecting the power amplifier

failure_mode: Master pump does not respond
failure_effect: Multi-pump operation is not functional

failure_mode: Abnormal thermal characteristics
failure_effect: Reduced output power

failure_mode: Controller RAM/Flash capacity is insufficient
failure_effect: Firmware update cannot be performed
cause_text: Increasing memory consumption in future software versions

failure_mode: Motor cable strain relief is inadequate
failure_effect: Risk of electric shock to the user
cause_text: Incorrect handling of the frequency converter by the user

failure_mode: Insufficient clearance between PCB components and metal back plate
failure_effect: ECU fault codes occur, leading to limp-home mode and engine shutdown
cause_text: Stamped metal back plate has lower stiffness compared to aluminum injected back plate

failure_mode: Fuse failure caused by a shorted EMI capacitor
failure_effect: Interference with nearby equipment

failure_mode: Magnetic emissions are excessively high
failure_effect: System becomes detectable and unsuitable for use

failure_mode: Motor cannot tolerate rapid load variations
failure_effect: PID controller becomes unstable

failure_mode: Damage to the power supply hardware
failure_effect: Power supply is no longer operational
cause_text: Reverse polarity applied to the input supply voltage

failure_mode: Power components are faulty
failure_effect: Failure of the power supply output

failure_mode: Components suffer permanent damage
failure_effect: Power supply is inoperative with no output voltage, including possible loss of 24V

failure_mode: Enclosure is damaged
failure_effect: User is exposed to electric shock risk
cause_text: Wear and aging of the frequency converter

failure_mode: D-SUB connector does not mechanically fit
failure_effect: Motor cannot be operated

failure_mode: PWM signal quality is poor
failure_effect: Incorrect command execution leading to current trips
cause_text: Poor electrical connection caused by vibration

failure_mode: Emission levels are outside acceptable range
failure_effect: Interference affecting adjacent equipment

failure_mode: RS485 communication shows excessive bit error rate
failure_effect: User interface responds incorrectly
cause_text: External CITF cable becomes disconnected due to vibration or mechanical strain

failure_mode: Sensorless FOC control does not operate as expected
failure_effect: Energy efficiency does not meet specification

failure_mode: Enclosure has sustained damage
failure_effect: User may be exposed to electric shock

failure_mode: Control board does not recognize motor status
failure_effect: Motor control is partially or completely lost
cause_text: Loss of communication is not detected
